reaction: Scott jumped into our project ready to work, and didn't complain one bit about learning an entirely new development architecture!
We are so proud of your work on BYSOWeb.org! Many thanks for your important contribution.
Ever since Scott joined the team, our stories have been closing at an even faster pace!
Scott jump-started our project by working the weekend, and was ready to work when we met the following Monday.
Scott has been a great person to work with. He always makes sure that the work is done on time, and done right.
